remarks: Given a is equivalent to T., also given that b is equivalent to T, there exists a proof for a and b is equivalent to T. (Contributed by Jarvin Udandy, 29-Aug-2016.)
statement:
astbstanbst.1 $e |- ( ph <-> T. ) $.
astbstanbst.2 $e |- ( ps <-> T. ) $.
astbstanbst $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) <-> T. ) $.
